src:
Бойко Борисов: Скоро Силвестър Сталоун идва отново в България
02 Nov 2019, 17:21 by "Стандарт"
"Скоро Силвестър Сталоун идва отново в България.''
Това написа премиерът Бойко Борисов във Facebook и сподели видеоклип, на който Сталоун го поздравява.
За холивудските звезди София вече е утвърдена дестинация за работа - това е една от най-добрите реклами за страната ни!, казва премиерът.
А  неотдавна  самият  Рамбо засне  поздрав по повод рождения ден на Борисов, който беше на 13 юни.
Сталоун се обръща към него с думите: ''Честит рожден ден! Вършиш страхотна работа, продължавай да пробиваш.''
text:
Accepting the files of 5 presidential candidates in Algeria
02 Nov 2019, 17:10 by country newspaper
Algeria: Rebounds
Algeria's Independent National Electoral Authority (INEC) announced today the acceptance of five candidates to compete for the post of President of the Republic in the presidential elections scheduled for December 15th.
The head of the election authority Mohammed Sharafi in a press conference: The number of candidates who were able to meet the conditions for running for the election amounted to five names out of 22 submitted their nominations.
He added that this was related to the acting secretary general of the National Democratic Rally (RND) Ezzedine Mihoubi, the president of the National Building Movement Abdelkader Benkreina, the head of the Future Front Abdelaziz Belaid, as well as the former prime ministers Abdelmajid Taboun (independent) and Ali Benflis (party leader). Vanguards of Freedoms.
It is expected that, according to the Algerian electoral law, the list of candidates accepted to compete for the post of President of the Republic will be drawn up by the Constitutional Council, which is also authorized to examine appeals, if any, within 48 hours from the date of the announcement of the preliminary list by the Election Authority.
